title: Womens Dress
title_original: Women’s 100% Pure Cashmere Cableknit Sweater – Grade A Mongolian Cashmere Pullover, Soft Warm Luxury Crew Neck Knit

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater's quality amazing and appreciate its perfectly oversized fit. They describe it as super soft and warm. The material thickness receives mixed feedback from customers.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Might be the perfect sweater
items.body: Love this sweater! Super soft and perfectly oversized. It’s a perfect thickness, not too hot, I need to buy more colors! Read more
items.author: Melissa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, cozy, and warm
items.body: This sweater is so cozy and flattering. The cashmere feels buttery soft right out of the package - not itchy at all - and the quality is amazing. It’s warm enough for chilly days but still breathable. The sizing is just right, with a relaxed fit that still looks neat and put-together. I’ve been wearing it nonstop lately and already thinking about grabbing another color. Read more
items.author: mandy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin material. Runs large.
items.body: Very large and thin cashmere. Read more
items.author: Lynn McCorkle Saporito

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality.
items.body: Beautiful, soft and warm sweater. I love the cable design and quality of the weave. Read more
items.author: Janet W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product
items.body: Great product very ,excellent fit Read more
items.author: tom reed

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! Amazingly soft & breathable
items.body: I absolutely love this pull over sweater. It’s so soft and high quality, but very lightweight and breathable. It’s great if you run hot like I do, because it keeps you warm when it’s cold out but also allows for airflow during warmer times. This is perfect for the fall and layers nicely during winter coldness. This is my new favorite sweater. The fit is more loose than you might think, but not super loose. More like a relaxed fit. I purchased the small but I normally wear a medium. Size down if you want a “tighter” fit although it might still be looser like in my case. Read more
items.author: Arla Marie

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Cream, Oatmeal Beige, Charcoal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
